caption.title: The spread of wheat, barley, buckwheat, foxtail millet, broomcorn, and rice across Asia at the end of the Holocene Climatic Optimum (4030 cal. BP), 3550 cal. BP, 1690 cal. BP, and 1010 cal. BP.
caption.p: Sites that have evidence of a crop at a particular year are shown as black dots. See movies S1 to S6 for the full animations.
